properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 3 at 3:01AM PST until January 4 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected. Waves 2 to 3 feet, with highest waves from mid lake to
the north and east shores.

* WHERE...Lake Tahoe.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Saturday. The
strongest winds and roughest lake conditions are expected late
tonight through Saturday morning.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE
